how wrong it is to encounter uh blossoms

there's a very great difference between

that someone might feel that that

the book began uh
in a moment where I hadn't written for a

on a piece of paper a piece of music um
that I had never written before uh it

with a very short line that moved back

was suddenly dealing with the inherited

American Democratic project so suddenly

discarded
about uh trying to describe water

to come into the foreground because of
this uh alternation of a long and short
line which I had never tried before and
so to be completely honest as a maker I
would say um I wanted to write in that
music and explore everything that music
could do 11 books into this it was a
piece of music I
had it was a gold mine you know I was
